channel.title: CVE Feed for Netapp -- Data ONTAP operating in 7-Mode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Netapp -- Data ONTAP operating in 7-Mode

item.title: CVE-2019-5501|2024-08-04T20:01:51.442Z -- netapp -- data%20ontap%20operating%20in%207-mode
item.description: Data ONTAP operating in 7-Mode versions prior to 8.2.5P3 may disclose sensitive LDAP account information to unauthenticated remote attackers.

item.title: CVE-2019-5493|2024-08-04T19:54:53.494Z -- netapp -- data%20ontap%20operating%20in%207-mode
item.description: Data ONTAP operating in 7-Mode versions prior to 8.2.5P3 are susceptible to a vulnerability which discloses information to an unauthenticated attacker. A successful attack requires that multiple non-default options be enabled.
